articles.title: Cardi B appears to confirm Stefon Diggs split at L.A. concert
articles.description:
The rapper mentioned Diggs while performing in L.A, suggesting that the pair has split up.

The post Cardi B appears to confirm Stefon Diggs split at L.A. concert appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cardi B hinted at her split from Stefon Diggs during a concert in L.A.
The mention occurred on February 17, 2026, during her performance.
Boston fans of Diggs may feel affected by the news of their breakup.

articles.title: UMass ordered to lift suspension for student who organized pro-Palestinian protest
articles.description:
The student was suspended for one year following a September 2025 protest during a career fair at the university’s campus center.

The post UMass ordered to lift suspension for student who organized pro-Palestinian protest appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: UMass must lift a one-year suspension for a student protest organizer.
The protest occurred during a career fair in September 2025.
This ruling reinforces free speech rights for Boston university students.
